abstract: JPMorgan Chase agreed the acquisition of carbon offset provider ClimateCare for an undisclosed sum, the two businesses said in a joint statement.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase agreed the acquisition of carbon offset provider ClimateCare for an undisclosed sum, the two businesses said in a joint statement.

abstract: The embattled financial sector took another hit on Tuesday as JPMorgan Chase and UBS cut their earnings forecasts for Merrill Lynch and said they expect the Wall Street firm to disclose more write-downs.
lead_paragraph: The embattled financial sector took another hit on Tuesday as JPMorgan Chase and UBS cut their earnings forecasts for Merrill Lynch and said they expect the Wall Street firm to disclose more write-downs.

headline.main: In a Day of Downgrades, Merrill Takes a Hit
